name: replace_thermostat_schedules

arguments.name: zones
arguments.display_name: Choose Thermal Zones to change thermostat schedules on

arguments.name: material_cost
arguments.display_name: Material and Installation Costs per Thermal Zone

modeler_description_xml: Replace zone thermostat schedules with other schedules in the same file. If a zone does not have a thermostat this measure will not add one.
description_xml: Replace zone thermostat schedules with other schedules in the same file.  If a zone does not have a thermostat this measure will not add one.
